quoteSymbols.tooltip: List the quote symbols here, separated with line-breaks.

sortDirection.tooltip: Check to sort quotes in ascending order, uncheck to sort in descending order.

showChangeIcon.tooltip: Indicates whether the market price moved up, down, or is unchanged.

showQuoteName.tooltip: Display the quote name (eg. International Business Machines).

useLongQuoteName.description: Use long version for verbose name
useLongQuoteName.tooltip: Use the long version for quote name, if available (eg. International Business Machines Corporation).

linkQuoteName.tooltip: Click name to open quote in browser.

linkQuoteSymbol.tooltip: Click symbol to open quote in browser.

showCurrencyCode.tooltip: Display the currency symbol of the price (eg. $).

showAbsoluteChange.tooltip: Display the absolute change of the market price (eg. +0.739).

showPercentChange.tooltip: Display the percent change of the market price (eg. +0.53%).

colorPercentChange.description: Use trend colors for percent change
colorPercentChange.tooltip: Color the percent change to show the trend (green for up, red for down).

showTradeTime.tooltip: Display the last trading time (if current day) or date.
